summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Sections 2.201 and 10.307 of the Seattle Fire Code adopted by Section 22.600.020 of the Seattle Municipal Code Sections 22.206.150 and 22.206.160 of the Seattle Municipal Code (Section 4.15 and 4.16, Housing Code 106319) to provide for enforcement of RCW 48.48.140 requiring smoke detection devices in certain dwelling units.
